snippet.title: Half-Life : Echoes - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for Half-Life : Echoes - An upcoming GoldSrc mod that allows you to re-live the Black Media Incident from a different perspective. 

The creator has announced that the mod is currently in playtesting and will be released very soon.

https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-echoes

--------------
